item.title: Full WWE 2K26 Roster—Every Wrestler In The Game
item.content:encoded:
With just two weeks until its release, 2K Games has announced the full launch roster for WWE 2K26.

This year’s game promises over 400 playable characters along with a number of unplayable managers, referees, and more. You can check out the full roster, including those available as part of Ringside Pass Season 1, below, courtesy of 2K.

Other wrestlers for future seasons of the ringside pass will be announced at a later date. Once they are, however, they will be added to this story.

WWE 2K26 launches on March 6 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC for those with the higher-tiered versions of the game. Those with the standard edition have to wait until March 13 to play.
